languages.text: The Vizsier's next successful attack splashes a cone of blood behind the target. Whenever an enemy moves to any affected cell, that enemy suffers +1 stack of {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g}. Additionally, this attack grants +1 stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} to the Vizsier and inflicts +1 stack of {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} on his target. These effects last for 2 rounds.

traits.locale_text: The next successful attack performed by Vizsier leaves a cone of blood on the ground. Any enemy that steps into that area, receives 1 stack of {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Bloodstained{/g}. Also, this attack applies 1 stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Bloodstained{/g} to Vizsier and 1 stack of {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Bloodstained{/g} to the main target with 2 rounds duration.

The Vizsier's next successful attack splashes a cone of blood behind the target. Whenever an enemy moves to any affected cell, that enemy suffers +1 stack of {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g}. Additionally, this attack grants +1 stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} to the Vizsier and inflicts +1 stack of {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} on his target. These effects last for 2 rounds.

Additionally, this attack grants +1 stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} to the Vizsier and inflicts +1 stack of {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} on his target. These effects last for 2 rounds.

The Vizsier's next successful attack splashes a cone of blood behind the target. Whenever an enemy moves to any affected cell, that enemy suffers +1 stack of {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g}. These effects last for 2 rounds.

The Vizsier's next successful attack splashes a cone of blood behind the target. Whenever an enemy moves to any affected cell, that enemy suffers +1 stack of {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g}. Additionally, this attack grants +1 stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} to the Vizsier and inflicts +1 stack of {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} on his target. These effects last for 2 rounds.

languages.translation_comment:
DLC-1. Глава IV. Локация DeathCultTemple.
Следующая мили-атака покрывает конус в 90° и длиной на 5 клеток позади атакованного кровью. Все попавшие в этот конус враги, равно как изначальная цель и сам глава культа, на 2 раунда получают 1 стак баффа Bloodsoaked.

languages.text: Следующая успешная атака Висиря заливает кровью пол позади цели в области проекции конуса. Наступая на такую клетку, противник получает +1 уровень {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}багряного приговора{/g}. Также эта атака дает +1 уровень {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}багряного благословения{/g} Висирю и накладывает на его цель +1 уровень {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}багряного приговора{/g}. Эти эффекты действуют 2 раунда.

Следующая успешная атака Висиря заливает кровью пол позади цели в области проекции конуса. Наступая на такую клетку, противник получает +1 уровень {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}багряного приговора{/g}. Также эта атака дает +1 уровень {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}багряного благословения{/g} Висирю и накладывает на его цель +1 уровень {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}багряного приговора{/g}. Эти эффекты действуют 2 раунда.

languages.text: El próximo ataque con éxito del Visir rocía un cono de sangre detrás del objetivo. Cada vez que un enemigo se mueva a una de las casillas afectadas, ese enemigo recibe +1 acumulación de {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}mancha de sangre{/g}. Además, este ataque confiere +1 acumulación de {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bendecido por la sangre{/g} al Visir e inflige +1 acumulación de {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}mancha de sangre{/g} a su objetivo. Estos efectos duran 2 asaltos.
languages.original_text: The Vizsier's next successful attack splashes a cone of blood behind the target. Whenever an enemy moves to any affected cell, that enemy suffers +1 stack of {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g}. Additionally, this attack grants +1 stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} to the Vizsier and inflicts +1 stack of {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} on his target. These effects last for 2 rounds.

traits.locale_text: El próximo ataque con éxito del Visir rocía un cono de sangre detrás del objetivo. Cada vez que un enemigo se mueva a una de las casillas afectadas, ese enemigo recibe +1 acumulación de {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}mancha de sangre{/g}. Además, este ataque confiere +1 acumulación de {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bendecido por la sangre{/g} al Visir e inflige +1 acumulación de {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}mancha de sangre{/g} a su objetivo. Estos efectos duran 2 asaltos.

languages.text: ヴィジールの次の攻撃が成功した場合、対象の背後に円錐状の血しぶきがかかる。敵が影響を受けたマスに移動するたび、その敵は+1スタックの{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血まみれ{/g}を受ける。さらに、この攻撃はヴィジールに+1スタックの{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}ブラッドブレスド{/g}を与え、対象に+1スタックの{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血まみれ{/g}を与える。これらの効果は2ラウンド持続する。
languages.original_text: The Vizsier's next successful attack splashes a cone of blood behind the target. Whenever an enemy moves to any affected cell, that enemy suffers +1 stack of {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g}. Additionally, this attack grants +1 stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} to the Vizsier and inflicts +1 stack of {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} on his target. These effects last for 2 rounds.

traits.locale_text: ヴィジールの次の攻撃が成功した場合、対象の背後に円錐状の血しぶきがかかる。敵が影響を受けたマスに移動するたび、その敵は+1スタックの{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血まみれ{/g}を受ける。さらに、この攻撃はヴィジールに+1スタックの{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}ブラッドブレスド{/g}を与え、対象に+1スタックの{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血まみれ{/g}を与える。これらの効果は2ラウンド持続する。

languages.text: 宿老下次命中敌人时，会让目标身后扇形区域内溅上血迹。每当宿老的敌人移动至受影响的地块内时，该名敌人都会获得1层{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血染{/g}效果。此外，此次攻击会让宿老获得1层{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}血佑{/g}效果，同时对目标施加1层{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血染{/g}效果。上述所有效果持续两轮。
languages.original_text: The Vizsier's next successful attack splashes a cone of blood behind the target. Whenever an enemy moves to any affected cell, that enemy suffers +1 stack of {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g}. Additionally, this attack grants +1 stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} to the Vizsier and inflicts +1 stack of {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} on his target. These effects last for 2 rounds.

traits.locale_text: 宿老下次命中敌人时，会让目标身后扇形区域内溅上血迹。每当宿老的敌人移动至受影响的地块内时，该名敌人都会获得1层{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血染{/g}效果。此外，此次攻击会让宿老获得1层{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}血佑{/g}效果，同时对目标施加1层{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血染{/g}效果。上述所有效果持续两轮。

languages.text: Der nächste erfolgreiche Angriff des Wesir erzeugt hinter dem Ziel einen Kegel aus Blut. Bewegt sich ein Gegner auf eine betroffene Zelle, wird er mit +1 Stapel {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Blutbefleckt{/g} belegt. Ferner gewährt dieser Angriff dem Wesir +1 Stapel {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Blutsegen{/g} und belegt sein Ziel mit +1 Stapel {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Blutbefleckt{/g}. Dieser Effekt dauert 2 Runden lang an.
languages.original_text: The Vizsier's next successful attack splashes a cone of blood behind the target. Whenever an enemy moves to any affected cell, that enemy suffers +1 stack of {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g}. Additionally, this attack grants +1 stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} to the Vizsier and inflicts +1 stack of {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} on his target. These effects last for 2 rounds.

traits.locale_text: Der nächste erfolgreiche Angriff des Wesir erzeugt hinter dem Ziel einen Kegel aus Blut. Bewegt sich ein Gegner auf eine betroffene Zelle, wird er mit +1 Stapel {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Blutbefleckt{/g} belegt. Ferner gewährt dieser Angriff dem Wesir +1 Stapel {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Blutsegen{/g} und belegt sein Ziel mit +1 Stapel {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Blutbefleckt{/g}. Dieser Effekt dauert 2 Runden lang an.

languages.text: La prochaine attaque réussie du vizir projette un cône de sang derrière la cible. Chaque ennemi qui pénètre sur une case affectée subit +1 cumul de {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Taché de sang{/g}. De plus, cette attaque confère +1 cumul de {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Béni par le sang{/g} au vizir et inflige +1 cumul de {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Taché de sang{/g} à sa cible. Les effets durent 2 rounds.
languages.original_text: The Vizsier's next successful attack splashes a cone of blood behind the target. Whenever an enemy moves to any affected cell, that enemy suffers +1 stack of {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g}. Additionally, this attack grants +1 stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} to the Vizsier and inflicts +1 stack of {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} on his target. These effects last for 2 rounds.
